channel.title: student advice on Deokgun Park
channel.description: Recent content in student advice on Deokgun Park

item.title: What to do after reading a paper
item.description: We read a lot of papers. This is my standarized procedure for reading a paper such that the insight from it can be kept and spread.

item.title: Advice for the master students who want to do reserach in my lab
item.description: If you plan to pursue PhD after your master, it might be a good idea to experience research in my lab. If you plan to industry career, it might not.

item.title: Advice for the undergraduate students who consider the graduate school
item.description: If you are not sure, getting a SW job is okay. If you study AI by yourself for one or two years, you might consider applying for PhD program.

item.title: How to use your advisor
item.description: If you have a technical problem. Solve it on your own while producing shareable outcome. If you have a research idea, your advisor can help you evaluate whether it is intractable, already done, or trivial.

item.title: The HDILab culture
item.description: In HDILab, we learn by teaching. Do not study or work but create a sharable output. Be true to yourself.

item.title: AGI Research in HDILab
item.description: Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) Research at Human Data Interaction Lab (HDILab)
